TEXT.TITLE: BEST <BES> TO BUY BACK TWO MLN SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Best Products Co Inc said planned to repurchase up to two mln shares of its common for employee benefit plans and general corporate purposes. Best has about 27.1 mln shares outstanding. Reuter
